meanings.sent1: The flaxy fabric felt smooth against her skin.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful flaxy color.
meanings.sent3: The flaxy material danced in the wind like a gentle stream.
meanings.sent4: The flaxy clouds in the sky seemed to be woven by nature's hand.
meanings.sent5: The flaxy texture of the cloth reminded her of a field of flowers.

meanings.sent1: The flaxy fields stretched as far as the eye could see.
meanings.sent2: His shirt was flaxy from working in the fields.
meanings.sent3: The flaxy coat made him look like a walking garden.
meanings.sent4: The flaxy landscape was a sea of green waves.
meanings.sent5: The flaxy scent of the farm filled the air with freshness.

meanings.sent1: The flaxy bread had a unique taste.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the flaxy flavor of the cereal.
meanings.sent3: The flaxy soup warmed her up on a cold day.
meanings.sent4: The flaxy ingredients gave the dish a wholesome touch.
meanings.sent5: The flaxy seeds added a crunchy texture to the dish.
